name: Robinson's Toolkit: Add Upstash Redis handler
task: Add a new upstashRedisSet handler method to the UpstashRedisHandler class that sets a key-value pair in Redis using the upstashRedisFetch wrapper

name: Robinson's Toolkit: Add Upstash Redis GET handler
task: Add a new upstashRedisGet handler method to the UpstashRedisHandler class that retrieves a value from Redis using the upstashRedisFetch wrapper

name: Robinson's Toolkit: Add Upstash Redis DEL handler
task: Add a new upstashRedisDel handler method to the UpstashRedisHandler class that deletes a key from Redis using the upstashRedisFetch wrapper
